long_description: The small yet powerful Fenix TK35 LED flashlight blasts a stunning 900-lumen beam up to 380m to light up the night for camping, hiking or waiting out a power outage. Featuring 4 brightness settings and 2 strobe modes, the flashlight has a single high-quality Cree XL-L2 LED that outputs 900 lumens on turbo and 15 lumens on low. 8 CR123A lithium batteries (included) provide up to 1 hr. 45 min. of use on turbo, 5 hrs. 30 min. on high, 18 hrs. on mid and 140 hrs. on low. Regulator maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Hard-anodized aircraft-grade aluminum body will stand up to rugged use in the outdoors. Flashlight has an IPX8 water-resistance rating for protection against prolonged immersion in water deeper than 1m (3.3 ft.). 2 buttons on the tail cap let you turn the light on and switch between modes; easy to operate with 1 hand. Can also operate on four 18650 rechargeable lithium-ion batteries (not included). Flashlight measures 1.7 x 6.5 in. Fenix TK35 LED flashlight includes a lanyard, spare O ring and a holster.
short_description: The small yet powerful Fenix TK35 LED flashlight blasts a stunning 900-lumen beam up to 380m to light up the night for camping, hiking or waiting out a power outage.
